alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 26 at 2:16AM MDT until October 27 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow occurring with additional accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Locally heavier accumulations possible. * WHERE...Bighorn Canyon, Northern Big Horn, Southern Big Horn, Treasure, and Southern Rosebud. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses will be slick and hazardous. SNowfall on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Northern Big Horn; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Treasure
